Name: SPACE.slack
PrologProcedure:
# Get the SPACE host from the config cube
sURL = CellGetS( 'SPACE.cfg', 'Value', 'SPACE.host' ) | '/python/';

#TODO: update API
# Use ExecuteHttpRequest in IBM PA V12 or user SPACE.ExecuteHttpRequest in older versions
#ExecuteHttpRequest(
#  'POST',
#  sURL,
#  'd {"file": "slack.message.py", "action":"RUN",arguments: ["'| sChannel |'","'| sMessage |'"]}',
#  '-k' );
  
ExecuteProcess( 'SPACE.ExecuteHttpRequest', 
  'sRequestId', TIMST(NOW(), '\Y\m\d\h\i\s'),
  'sUrl', sURL,
  'sMethod', 'POST',
  'sBodyJSON', '{"file": "slack.py", "action":"RUN",arguments:["'| sChannel |'","'| sMessage |'"]}'
  );
